)

opts <- slickR::settings(
         accessibility = TRUE,
         adaptiveHeight = TRUE,
         initialSlide = 0,
         slidesToShow = 2,
         slidesToScroll = 1,
         focusOnSelect = TRUE,
         dots = TRUE
)
slickR::slickR(obj = ScatterPlotsImages,
       height = 400,
       width = "92%") +
  opts
